full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
------------------------

### Project Title
A&E Services for Office Fit-Up for Canada's Embassy in the Philippines

### Tender Reference Number
cb-7872-59056266

### Tender Type
Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement (SA)

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

### Closing Date
2023-09-05T14:00:00

### Expected Contract Duration
From 2023-09-18 to 2025-09-18

### Goods and Service Code (GSC)
81101508

### Brief Description
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) requires Architectural and Engineering (A&E) services for an office fit-up for additional space at the Embassy of Canada to the Philippines located in Manila. The services include, but are not limited to:

* Pre-design site visit
* Validation of DFATD concept design
* Design development
* Construction drawings
* Tender package
* Contract administration
* Commissioning and deficiency correction

### Eligibility Requirements
The bidder must meet the following criteria:

* Be eligible to bid on the supply arrangement
* Have the necessary expertise and resources to complete the project
* Adhere to Canadian government policies and procedures

### Evaluation Criteria
The proposal will be evaluated on the basis of the following criteria:

* Lowest price
* Compliance with the tender documents

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Meagan Leclair, Contracting Authority, at:

Phone: (343) 548-8491
Email: Meagan.Leclair@international.gc.ca
Address: 125 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0G2, Canada

### Additional Resources
Tender documents are available for download from the [Canadabuys site](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7872/24-246339---npp-en.pdf)

Please ensure to submit your proposal on or before the closing date to be considered. We look forward to reviewing your proposal! [info.dt@international.gc.ca](mailto:info.dt@international.gc.ca)
